item.content:encoded: Introducing the Thriving UiTM Esports Hub!Â  Are you a passionate gamer studying at Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM)? Look no further! Weâ€™re excited to announce the launch of our brand-new online community exclusively for UiTM students who share a love for esports. Whether youâ€™re a seasoned pro or just starting out, our platform offers a space to connect, compete, and collaborate with fellow gamers. From organizing tournaments to discussing the latest game strategies, the UiTM Esports Hub is your go-to destination. Join us today and level up your gaming experience!
